titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the age requirement for eligibility for the one-time exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the age requirement for eligibility for the one-time exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence by an individual.
